references: Related: CF 211987, CF 212391, CF 212410, CF 212416, CF 212098. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 1, Block 10, Hill Tract Addition; a portion of the northwest quarter of the southwest quarter of Section 22-24-4; Lots 3 and 4, Block 19, Commercial Street Steam Motor Addition; the south 25 feet of Lot 4 and the north 25 feet of Lot 5, Block 9, Prospect Terrace Addition; and Lots 22, 23, 24 and 25, Block 9, Ballard Park Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-294 and 17-239, respectively.
